title: Whataburger Challenge
text:
3141 S. McKenzie St., Foley Foley, AL 36535 
5:00 p.m. Thursday, Oct. 22, 2015 Categories 
Events, Fundraisers, Sports On Thursday, Oct. 22, Whataburger customers are invited to witness an incredible feat of endurance and show their support for the Foley High School Quarterback Club. Two representatives from each of the freshman, junior varsity and varsity teams will compete to keep their hands on an inflatable Whataburger cup the longest. The last competitor standing will receive a free Whataburger each week for an entire year, along with a $1,000 donation to the football program. A $500 donation will also be given to the team that brings the most fans. To add the fun, 97.5 WABDâ€™s John and Johnna will emcee the event. Spectators are encouraged to come out and show their support while enjoying their favorite menu items.
